meanings.definition: To throw or hit a baseball in a way that results in a home run.
meanings.sent1: During the game, he homered the ball over the fence.
meanings.sent2: She homered the baseball out of the park with a powerful swing.
meanings.sent3: The young player homered the ball so far that it landed in the neighbor's yard!
meanings.sent4: His swing homered the ball like a rocket launching into the sky.
meanings.sent5: With a mighty swing, he homered the ball into the stands, exciting the crowd.

meanings.definition: The act of hitting a home run in baseball.
meanings.sent1: His homering of the ball earned his team a crucial point.
meanings.sent2: The crowd cheered loudly at her impressive homering of the baseball.
meanings.sent3: The little league player's homering of the ball made his parents proud.
meanings.sent4: Her consistent homering of the ball set a new record for the team.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the bat connecting with the ball echoed after his homering hit.
